archimate:Requirement.name: SI-4(3): System Monitoring | Automated Tool and Mechanism Integration
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Employ automated tools and mechanisms to integrate intrusion detection tools and mechanisms into access control and flow control mechanisms.

properties.value: Using automated tools and mechanisms to integrate intrusion detection tools and mechanisms into access and flow control mechanisms facilitates a rapid response to attacks by enabling the reconfiguration of mechanisms in support of attack isolation and elimination.
